item.title: OAuth 2.0 - What could go wrong
item.description: Nowadays modern web applications may implement or use OAuth 2.0 for there own services. In this post we will understand how OAuth 2.0 works and how it can present vulnerabilities. TL;DR Link to heading OAuth 2.0 is an authorization framework defines a set of protocols that allow an application (Client) to obtain authorization grants (permissions) from Authorization-Server for certain resources/actions of a Resource-Owner from the Resource-Server.
